thread.title: Man United ace Paul Pogba puts injury woe behind him with a boogie
thread.title_full: Man United ace Paul Pogba puts injury woe behind him with a boogie

author: Chris Wright
title: Man United ace Paul Pogba puts injury woe behind him with a boogie
text:
Man United ace Paul Pogba puts injury woe behind him with a boogie Paul Pogba limped out of Manchester United's win over Rostov in the Europa League. 
As any physiotherapist worth their salt will tell you, the best way to shake off a hamstring twinge is to spend the evening dancing in front of the television. 
Manchester United fans can therefore rest easy knowing that's exactly how Paul Pogba spent his Monday evening, mimicking the choreography on show as his brothers Matias and Florentine were put through their paces on a French television show. A post shared by Paul Labile Pogba (@paulpogba) on Mar 19, 2017 at 4:25pm PDT 
"La Pogbance" is medically proven to alleviate muscle strains, ease ligament pain and generally increase your well-being. 
You've got to hand it to the Pogba brothers -- they certainly know how to dress for the occasion, provided the occasion is the reunion of every character from Running Man. 
Chris covers the funny side of the game for ESPN FC in the Toe Poke blog.
